vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐντρέφω,
poetry ἐνιτ-, ={τρέφω ἐν}, bring up or train in, τέκνα [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—middle, φυτὰ ἐνθρέψασθαι [Refs 8th c.BC+] —passive, to be raised or bred in, γυμνάσια οἷσιν ἐνετράφην [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ποιήμασι, ἤθει, [NT+1st c.AD+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be brought up, reared, trained
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be brought up, reared, trained
to nourish in, bring up, or educate in, 1Tim. 4:6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: vivir de, nutrirse, alimentarse de, educarse en
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 培育
2) 接受...訓練 (提前 4:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 培育
2) 接受...训练 (提前 4:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nuôi; nuôi dưỡng; nuôi dạy. ἐν (G1722) + τρέφω (G5142)
